channel.title: Comments on: Google on speed – and how to get it down again

item.title: By: Hilli
item.dc:creator: Hilli
item.description:
Then again you would have to run some dirty operating system.
Firefox users should checkout about:config and set network.http.pipelining to true and network.http.pipelining.maxrequest to e.g. 8 (max value).
item.content:encoded:
Then again you would have to run some dirty operating system.

Firefox users should checkout about:config and set network.http.pipelining to true and network.http.pipelining.maxrequest to e.g. 8 (max value).
